options.formula:
IF(
    {fldUXb3uRvU4iB8ag},
    MAX(
        0,
        DATETIME_DIFF({fldUXb3uRvU4iB8ag}, TODAY(), "days")
        - 2 * DATETIME_DIFF({fldUXb3uRvU4iB8ag}, TODAY(), "weeks")
        - IF(WEEKDAY({fldUXb3uRvU4iB8ag}) = 6, 1, 0)
        - IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 6, 1, 0)
    )
)

IF(
  {fldvdgqxiIqUOj6N5} = "una tantum",
  BLANK(),
  IF(
    {fldvdgqxiIqUOj6N5} = "mensile",
    DATEADD(
      {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb},
      IF(
        DATEADD(
          {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb},
          CEILING(DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb}, "months")),
          "months"
        ) <= TODAY(),
        CEILING(DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb}, "months")) + 1,
        CEILING(DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb}, "months"))
      ),
      "months"
    ),
    IF(
      {fldvdgqxiIqUOj6N5} = "annuale",
      DATEADD(
        {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb},
        IF(
          DATEADD(
            {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb},
            DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb}, "years"),
            "years"
          ) <= TODAY(),
          DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb}, "years") + 1,
          DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldQ4z8qudiLlcfZb}, "years")
        ),
        "years"
      )
    )
  )
)

choices.name: Generare contatti o richieste di preventivo
Iscrizione a una newsletter o community
